sentence.Network_en: Within our own galaxy there are probably tens of thousands of planetary systems.
sentence.Network_cn: 在我们自己的星系里可能有数以万计的行星系。

sentence.Network_en: These bands must introduce longitudinal asymmetry in the planetary albedo.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些云带必定引起行星反照率的经向不对称性.

sentence.Network_en: Very accurate predictious of planetary orbits require corrections to the central - field approximation.
sentence.Network_cn: 想要非常准确地预言行星的轨道,就需要对中心场近似进行修正.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from late Latin planetarius 'relating to the planets' (recorded only as a noun meaning 'astrologer'), from planeta 'planet'

entry.def: Planetary means relating to or belonging to planets.

example.ex: Within our own galaxy there are probably tens of thousands of planetary systems.
example.tran: 在我们自己的星系里可能有数以万计的行星系。

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to or resembling the physical or orbital characteristics of a planet or the planets;
2. of or relating to or characteristic of the planet Earth or its inhabitants;
4. involving the entire earth; not limited or provincial in scope;
